description: Try our easy to follow Griddled Summer Chicken Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Griddled Summer Chicken Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put the boiled potatoes in a large bowl. Tear the basil, reserving a few leaves intact to garnish, and add to the bowl, together with the chicken and all the vegetables. Add the olive oil, balsamic vinegar and seasoning. Toss the salad and garnish with the reserved basil leaves.
